reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be a perfect fit and excellent quality, describing it as gorgeous and very flattering on the body. They appreciate its comfort, with one customer noting it's comfortable with a strapless bra, and another mentioning it's ideal for formal events like prom or weddings. The dress receives positive feedback for its value for money, though opinions about the fabric thickness are mixed. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purchase..
items.body: This dress is so beautiful, true to size ,length everything was phenomenal absolutely recommend üëå üëè ‚ù§Ô∏è had to buy another dress as this one did not come on time for the event i wanted it for due to some delays but the dress was great ...1000 percent recommend Read more
items.author: Tammy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful gown
items.body: This dress met every expectation the quality is great. The color and sequence amazing exactly what I wanted very flattering on the body. The material isn‚Äôt too thick, but not too light and was very comfortable for an evening out with my husband at a gala. I was able to move around in it with no problem. It stretched how it needed to stretch. Read more
items.author: manny

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wrong color but beautiful dress!
items.body: Ordered chocolate color. As you can see, that‚Äôs not the color I received. However, the dress is comfortable. Made very nice. Fits beautifully and is long enough if you are tall. I am 5‚Äô11‚Äù 200lbs and ordered a large. I have bigger hips and like no chest so this size worked for me. Would give 5 stars but the color doesn‚Äôt match even close to what was ordered so I can not wear it for the event. Also, you can give measurements if you are okay waiting a bit longer for the dress to arrive. I did not give measurements and just ordered as is and it is still stunning. Read more
items.author: Kendrick M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised
items.body: I took my chances with purchasing an evening gown on Amazon, but the reviews were good and the price was right. So here is good and bad for this purchase. The bad - the dress is cheaply made. Unfinished fabric and crooked stitching. But I‚Äôm ok with it, considering the price. - it keep shedding little red particles. When it first arrived and I took it out of the bag. I thought it‚Äôs shedding because it‚Äôs new. However after shaking it over and over, trying it around the house and actually wearing it for 8 hours, still, it leave the trail of little red pieces of fabric or threats‚Ä¶ every time I handle the dress, I need to pull out a vacuum to clean up. - I never got an email requesting measurements, like others say in their reviews. - it came in a bag and was super wrinkly. After trying to steam it, I was completely unsuccessful. The wrinkles just impossible to get out. But because it‚Äôs covered with sequins, you can‚Äôt really tell, unless you really pay attention. - from what I understand, this dress is not machine washable, and with all the sequins I doubt the dry cleaning will take it. So hand wash??? The tag on the dress is cut off and there is not instruction. Good - it arrived a day or two early - the fabric is stretchy, for a better fit. It actually fits really really well. - it had a lot of structure on top, and it‚Äôs not flimsy at all, considering; the price. It has a built in bra cup, and I didn‚Äôt need to wear a bra with it, but I‚Äôm cup A. It is also fully lined. - I‚Äôd like to mention again, that it fits well and true to size. I purchased size 4 and was very comfortable in it. I could have got away with 2, but it would have been a little tight‚Ä¶ 4 was just perfect. I‚Äôm 31-27-37 for reference. - the dress is gorgeous, I got so many compliments! Read more
items.author: E J HANNA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Gown!!
items.body: This dress was gorgeous! Just how it looked in the pictures! Fit true to size and is perfect for that formal event you will be attending. Hugs all the right curves and is a great value for the cost. Only minor con was that the train does indeed drag the floor and a few people did step on it. The compliments you will receive wearing this stunning gown is worth it though! Read more
items.author: Catherine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bell of the ball
items.body: Beautiful dress and came on time I'm 4'11 so it's super long on me but it was comfy with a strapless bra ! Read more
items.author: Giana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its flattering to all body types
items.body: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è I absolutely love this dress! It was perfect for my wife‚Äôs cancer-free celebration party. The fit was flattering, comfortable to wear all evening, and the pink color was absolutely beautiful for the occasion. It looked even better in person than in the photos. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a more perfect choice‚Äîit made the day feel extra special. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Dana O' Hara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering dress
items.body: My daughter won her middle school prom queen in this dress. It fit great and was a super adorable dress. I was actually pleasantly surprised and she loved it. Read more
items.author: Kristi

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Mermaid Ruched Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Mermaid Ruched Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Orange, Plum, Blush Pink, Lavender, Royal Blue, Teal, Grey, Gold, Burgundy, Chocolate. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
